snippet: The I.R.S. has asked Coinbase, the largest Bitcoin exchange in the United States, for the records of customers who bought virtual currency from 2013 to 2015....
lead_paragraph: The I.R.S. has asked Coinbase, the largest Bitcoin exchange in the United States, for the records of customers who bought virtual currency from 2013 to 2015.

headline.main: Bitcoin Users Who Evade Taxes Are Sought by the I.R.S.
headline.print_headline: I.R.S. Seeks Tax Evaders Who Trade in Bitcoin
